text:
Hey dude, I think that proof of concept is good! Doing what you need it too! It could maybe be worth having a bit of a bigger camera move on there? Maybe have it sweep a bit lower down to the piers, so you can show off your modelling a bit bigger on screen. Other than that I think it’s looking really cool!

And yeah sure! Here’s the link: <https://vimeo.com/387289604|https://vimeo.com/387289604>
The password is: V1sualEffects

Only thing, if you could not share it around please, sometimes they get a bit picky about showreels

Cheers!
Yeah I get what you mean with the camera movement because the 3D stuff is pretty far away from the camera. How would I go about doing that just because I don't have a drone to refilm. Would I need to create the ocean in VFX so that I can just change the camera path in 3D for perspective change rather than a camera Projection?

That's awesome! Makes me wanna watch dark crystal haha! Yeah don't worry I won't share it. I just like looking at peoples reels for inspiration haha

I made a start on cleaning some of the people up, obviously not finished yet but happy with the start so far

<https://youtu.be/-6Np05ityG4|https://youtu.be/-6Np05ityG4>
